welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bladel, a charming town in the Netherlands known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and embrace all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but it may require a login with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities for handling and storing goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport is used for freight and shipping purposes.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
